entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Update nullable annotations on `JsonSerializer.Serialize<TValue>` #83930
  • baseservices/threading/regressions/beta1/347011/347011.dll test failed #83929
  • GetSystemTimeZones() returns incorrect StandardName etc. #83924
  • [API Proposal]: Dictionary.TrySetValue #83920
  • System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests crashing on Linux x64 #83917
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.EventLogMessagesTests crash #83915
  • Explore deduplicating manual unrolling of IndexOf{Any} operations #83913

Closed

  • Unable to cross-compile CoreCLR for Linux ARM vfpv4-d16 #83170
  • illegal read of byte preceding an automatic (stack allocate) variable #73718
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete redundant test #83931
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Replace emtpy string literals in Marshal.cs #83928
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Ensure kmask registers are marked available #83927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Preserve OCE.CancellationToken in ReadAtLeastAsync of StreamPipeReader #83926
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Documentation for loading custom files in Blazor. #83925
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Read StartDiskNumber as uint32 #83923
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution

Merged

  • Introducing Time abstraction Part1 #83604
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Disable EVEX support until the bug can be resolved #83922
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Comment out Iran timezone tests #83916
    needs-area-label
  • Persist FPU variables across try_compile passes #83206
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Unroll Buffer.Memmove for arm64 #83740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX support by default #83648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Stop creating "location" commas #83814
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Exclude a source-gen test project from NativeAOT #83881
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update BOTR description of function pointer #83914
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Unify managed runtime type name parsers #83484
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix a read-out-of-local error in the MD library. #83906
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix false PASS JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests/DivConst.cs #83880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Enable mono runtime to handle SIGTERM like CoreCLR #82806 #82813
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Partially expand static initialization #83911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods. #82981
  • Proper type name parser for native AOT compiler #83657
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Fixes for two rare stress issues. #83908
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Updating Unix to save/restore Avx512 state #83784
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • JIT: import entire method for OSR, prune unneeded parts later #83910
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Enable the cold calling conv on osx/linux. #83519
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Switch mono to use cmake-detected objcopy #83903
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Implement the STJ.DisableDefaultReflection feature switch #83844
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • JIT: Generalize handling of commas in block morphing #83590
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Boost hit count for outer back branch targets; improve conditional execution detection #83630
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Libraries area pod updates for March 2023, plus some fabricbot maintenance #83897
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • AnalysisLevel property does not affect Code Style #63036
    Backlog
  • Source generators run very unreliably (especially with multi-targeting) #67123
    Backlog
  • New Inline Rename Does Not Respect Editor Shortcuts #66166
    17.6
  • ToDisplayString for IParameterSymbol adds parameter name nomatter the settings (by default) #67464

PullRequests

Created

  • Add '@' prefix when inline hint value is a reserved keyword in C# #67484
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Don't look to the global.json when we're loading a binlog #67483
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove unread field in the work coordinator. #67476
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update ExtractInterface to use IRefactoringHelpersService #67482
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #47420
  • Blazor WASM OIDC Token Response doesn't save custom properties from Token Response #47417

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #47386
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #47393
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes #47415
  • Container publish not functioning in DN8.P2; Worked in DN7 #47259
  • Output caching - support for donut caching #47268
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #47406
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #47407
  • Blazor Hybrid wrapper for hls.js fails to play hls media served on local LAN #47379

PullRequests

Created

  • Flow FullAssemblySigningSupported for source-build to repo tasks #47421
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Enable custom ICU loading. #47419
    area-blazor, Team:Runtime
  • Add MapIdentity<TUser>() #47414
    area-identity
  • Added a reminder for the breaking-change process #47412
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • EnumTypeModelBinder does not handle enum flags provided as a list #46049
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Fallback using the `CultureInfo.Parent` instead of using hyphen #46637
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SizeRequest OnMeasure doesn't fire #14202
  • Vertical Stack Layout compressed in a CollectionView in IOS and MacCatalyst #14200
  • Can ResourceDictionary add methods to replace ResourceDictionary? #14198
  • Maui BlazorWebView input covered by Keyboard #14197

Closed

  • i dont have MAUI when i want to select workload #13887
  • ScrollView not updating size on iOS #13246
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove ReceiveSms added by default #14203

Updated

  • Code generation now supports internal duplicate types #14171
    area/Xaml </>
  • Moves Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Gtk into the Maui repo #9522
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • [windows] ReadyToRun packages ahead of time #11744
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️
  • CollectionView - Recycle DataTemplates when using template selector #12011
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Fix issues with shell and pushing modals early #13990
    area/shell 🐢
  • [ios] fix memory leak with `Page` + `Layout` #14108
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • Essentials: Port Xamarin.MediaGallery #13564
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Couple of JSON support ideas #30519
  • Q: EF Core Connection resiliency ignore queries in transactions. #30533

Updated

  • Squash migrations #2174
    Backlog
  • InvalidOperationException when calling ExecuteUpdate with owned entity & using current value #30528
    7.0.x
  • AutoInclude causes ExecuteDelete to fail #30572
    7.0.x
  • "You need to call SQLitePCL.raw.SetProvider()" error when using Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite 5.0.4 via C++\CLI wrapper #24493
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.x] Fixes around IncludeExpression for ExecuteUpdate/Delete (#30571) #30579
    Servicing-consider

Merged

  • Fixes around IncludeExpression for ExecuteUpdate/Delete #30571

Updated

  • Don't duplicate query filter parameters #29422
  • Fix to #30115 - IndexOutOfRangeException in CreateNavigationExpansionExpression(Expression sourceExpression, IEntityType entityType) / get_Chars(Int32 index) when EF class named "<>f__AnonymousType01Child" in 7.0.2 version #30537
  • Generate compiled relational model #30494
  • Fix to #30565 - Query/Json: projecting entity collection along with json collection generates invalid shaper #30568
  • API review changes #30526
